job.title: Data Scientist - $200K to $300K Basic Salary + Bonus
job.description: <p><strong>**Base Salary $200k to $300k + Formulaic Payout</strong></p><p><br></p><p>Multi-strategy hedge fund is looking for an experienced PhD quantitative researcher to join its quantitative trading team.</p><p><br></p><p>Your core focus will be to perform advanced quantitative research to enhance existing and create new and profitable systematic trading strategies.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Skills &amp; Experience:</strong></p><p><br></p><p>&gt; A PhD in a quantitative discipline from a leading school.</p><p>&gt; Research expertise in one or more of econometrics, statistics, math, machine learning etc.</p><p>&gt; 3 - 10 years of experience in researching and building profitable systematic trading models &amp; strategies.</p><p>&gt; Cross-asset class experience is welcome but not required. </p><p>&gt; Self supporting programming skills in Python.</p><p>&gt; A profitable trading track record is welcome but not required.</p><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Please apply via this posting</u></strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>**Please Note: We are a niche recruitment firm specializing in the quantitative trading and Fintech Industry. We have been retained by our client to identify, interview and introduce suitable candidates for this position**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</strong></p>
